column6: CVE-2024-3400 is a critical command injection vulnerability affecting the GlobalProtect Gateway feature of PAN-OS. An unauthenticated, remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute code on an affected firewall with root privileges. This rule potentially detects triggering of the ThreatID 95187, which is released by PaloAlto Network to block this attack. More details on this regard can be found in the info links given.
column7: palo alto networks,cve-2024-3400,vulnerability,midnight eclipse,Defense Evasion,Indirect Command Execution,T1202,Execution,Command and Scripting Interpreter,T1059,md-info
